org.reprap.gui
Class STLObject

java.lang.Object
  org.reprap.gui.STLObject

public class STLObject
extends java.lang.Object

Class for holding a group (maybe just 1) of 3D objects for RepRap to make. They can be moved around on the build platform en mass, but not moved relative to each other, so they can represent an assembly made from several different materials.

Author:
adrian

          Little class to hold tripples of the parts of this STLObject loaded.

loadSingleSTL

private javax.media.j3d.BranchGroup loadSingleSTL(java.lang.String location,
                                                  Attributes att,
                                                  javax.vecmath.Vector3d offset,
                                                  STLObject lastPicked)
Actually load the stl file and set its attributes. Offset decides where to put it relative to the origin. If lastPicked is null, the file is loaded as a new independent STLObject; if not it is added to lastPicked and subsequently is subjected to all the same transforms, so they retain their relative positions. This is how multi-material objects are loaded.

Parameters:
location -
att -
offset -
lastPicked -
Returns:
